thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 2 of 266
thread.title: Mark Ruffing

author: Mark Ruffing
title: Mark Ruffing
text: I discovered Jomashop after pricing watches at Macy's. The exact same watches that Macy's carried, are more than 50% off at Jomashop. I have ordered three watches from them, Including one for my son's high school graduation. All of them have been excellent. I normally don't write reviews for retailers, but their products, prices, and service have been exceptional. Highly recommend.
